Hi Guys/Gals,
I have lowered the price of the 29.75 inch Shigetaka on my site from 
$6,900.00 to $5,900.00.

I am doing this for a limited time so I can put some funds together 
for a big purchase. 

Here is the link:

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/shige/shige.html

I doubt you will find a sword as beautiful and as long as this in 
full polish, new shirasaya, and fresh polish anywhere on the net.

If interested please contact me. I do ship from the US so I can 
insure my blades fully and register them as well.

Regards

Louis Skebo
www.japaneseswordcollector.com
